app.reason1.text: Just use our simple tag system. Reminders tell you what to get out before it stays for too long.
app.reason1.title: Don't waste food
app.reason2.text: Add items in seconds. And it's even faster to find & retreive!
app.reason2.title: Don't waste time
app.reason3.text: Nothing complicated! Just this site and regular sticky notes. Add and retreive food is a trivial task.

app.subtitle: Always know what you have in your freezer. Fast & so easy!
